description:
12.9 overlay_opencl
Overlay one video on top of another.

It takes two inputs and has one output. The first input is the "main" video on which the second input is overlaid.
This filter requires same memory layout for all the inputs. So, format conversion may be needed.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: overlay_opencl

options.description: Set the x coordinate of the overlaid video on the main video. Default value is 0.
options.name: x

options.description: Set the y coordinate of the overlaid video on the main video. Default value is 0.
options.name: y
